author: fabiocos
body:
This PR addresses a request of @slava77 https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25137#discussion_r232361749 of having available in the relval list a 2017 cosmics workflows. 

The parallel request for 2016 needs the clarification about the GT to be used from autoCond (@tocheng, @lpernie could you please clarify ?)

This update should be backported to #25151, if this is still needed.
title: Add (back) 2017 cosmic relval in PyReleaseValidation
